posts.message:
So we are doing an Experiment in our company is to discuss every project with all the teams and we see the approach taken and each team propose the best approach. at the end we discuss all the issues and why the approach wasn't correct.

and Guess what? we are doing it public so all Devs around the world make use of our mistakes.

First Project: Shirt Design Tool
https://github.com/freshout-dev/failedapproaches/wiki/Shirt-design-tool
